name: Dice Duel ([Error_27])
description:
Dice Duel is a basic arena fighter where your stats and stat bonuses are determined by roll of dice. A d8 is rolled at the beginning of the game to determine stats, and d6s are rolled for every upgrade.

CREDIT:

Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Controls:

WASD- Move

Mouse- Aim

Left Click- Attack
